titles.title: DIAPER Act
DIAPER Act
Diaper Inclusion in Accounts for Parental Expense Reduction Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make diapers an allowable expense for purposes of health flexible spending arrangements and health savings accounts.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Diaper Inclusion in Accounts for Parental Expense Reduction Act or the DIAPER Act
This bill allows the cost of diapers as an allowable medical expense for purposes of health savings accounts (HSAs) and health flexible spending arrangements (FSAs).
